Sequence Information.Family: Long chain scorpion toxin family (Class 2 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20097251]Non-hemolytic effect against mouse erythrocytes even at 100 μM
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Circular dichroism (CD) analysis of chemically synthesized peptides demonstrates that meucin-24 presents an essential random coil conformation in water, but its alpha-helical content largely increases in the presence of 50% trifluoroethanol, a membrane-mimicking environment.
Sequence Information.Function: The synthetic meucin-24 inhibits the development of P. berghei ookinetes, kills intraerythrocytic P.falciparum, and is cytotoxic to the Drosophila S2 cell at micromolar concentrations. No hemolytic activities have been found at micromolar concentrations.
Sequence Information.Miscellaneous: The RNA coding for this protein is silently edited.

Literature.Title: Characterization of two linear cationic antimalarial peptides in the scorpion Mesobuthus eupeus.
Literature.Author: Gao B, Xu J, Rodriguez Mdel C, Lanz-Mendoza H, HernÃ¡ndez-Rivas R, Du W, Zhu S.
